権利者: (けんりしゃ) - rightful claimant; beneficiary; right holder
権利行使: (けんりこうし) - exercise of a right

権利譲渡: (けんりじょうと) - transfer of rights; demise; quitclaim deed
権利譲渡証書: (けんりじょうとしょうしょ) - transfer certificate title (lot ownership certificates); deed of release
権利金: (けんりきん) - key money (esp. on an apartment); premium (payment)
権力に媚びる: (けんりょくにこびる) - to be obsequious to power

権力争い: (けんりょくあらそい) - power struggle
権力意志: (けんりょくいし) - the will to power (philosophical concept of Nietzsche)
権力政治: (けんりょくせいじ) - power politics
権力欲: (けんりょくよく) - lust for power
権力者: (けんりょくしゃ) - powerful or influential person
権力闘争: (けんりょくとうそう) - power struggle
権妻: (ごんさい) - mistress; concubine; non-legal wife
権威主義政府: (けんいしゅぎせいふ) - authoritarian government
権幕: (けんまく) - threatening attitude; menacing look; angry look
権殿: (ごんでん) - {Shinto} temporary shrine (houses the object in which the deity resides when main shrine is under repairs)
権現造: (ごんげんづくり) - style of Shinto architecture in which the main hall and worship hall share one roof, and are connected via an intermediate passageway
権現造り: (ごんげんづくり) - style of Shinto architecture in which the main hall and worship hall share one roof, and are connected via an intermediate passageway
権瑞: (ゴンズイ) - striped eel catfish (Plotosus lineatus) (lat: Plotosus)
権的: (ごんてき) - mistress; concubine; non-legal wife
権臣: (けんしん) - influential vassal; powerful retainer; powerful courtier
権萃: (ゴンズイ) - Euscaphis japonica (species of tree)
権謀術数: (けんぼうじゅっすう) - (yoji) trickery; wiles; finesse; Machiavellism
権謀術策: (けんぼうじゅっさく) - (yoji) trickery; wiles; intriguing strategy cleverly designed to fool others; Machiavellism
権道: (けんどう) - inappropriate means to a worthy end; expediency
権門勢家: (けんもんせいか) - great and powerful person
権限を与える: (けんげんをあたえる) - to authorize
権限内に: (けんげんないに) - within the scope of authority
権限委譲: (けんげんいじょう) - (yoji) delegation of authority (power); devolution; empowerment
横: (ou/yoko) - side , horizontal (as opposed to vertical), lying down; side-to-side (as opposed to front-to-back), width, breadth; side (of a box, etc.); beside, aside, next to
横から: (よこから) - from one's side/from the side (of something); from someone unconnected/from someone uninvolved
横から口をはさむ: (よこからくちをはさむ) - to butt into a conversation (from someone uninvolved)
横から口を挟む: (よこからくちをはさむ) - to butt into a conversation (from someone uninvolved)
横ぎる: (よこぎる) - to cross (e.g. road); to traverse
横ぐわえ: (よこぐわえ) - holding horizontally in one's mouth; holding on the side of one's mouth
横ずれ断層: (よこずれだんそう) - strike-slip fault
横たえる: (よこたえる) - to lay down; to wear (a sword, etc.) at one's side
横たわる: (よこたわる) - to lie down/to stretch out; to lie ahead (of danger, difficulty, etc.)/to lie in wait
横なぎ: (よこなぎ) - sweeping sideways; mowing down
横になる: (よこになる) - to lie down (and rest)
横の物を縦にもしない: (よこのものをたてにもしない) - too lazy to do anything
横ばい: (ヨコバイ) - (よこばい only) sidewise crawl (e.g. of a crab)/crawling sideways; leafhopper (insect)/jassid; sidewinder (Crotalus cerastes); levelling off (of prices, etc.)/stabilizing
横やりを入れる: (よこやりをいれる) - to interrupt; to butt in
横を向く: (よこをむく) - to look away; to turn away
横パイ: (よこパイ) - sideboob; (visible) side of a woman's breast
横レス: (よこレス) - message butting in (to a conversation between two other people on a BBS, etc.)
横丁: (よこちょう) - bystreet; side street; back street; alley; lane
横並び: (よこならび) - going along with something/following the crowd; treating something in an equal or egalitarian manner
横並び現象: (よこならびげんしょう) - herd instincts
横乳: (よこちち) - side of the breast; sideboob; side-boob
横倍角: (よこばいかく) - double width size
横倒し: (よこだおし) - falling over; toppling sideways
横側頭回: (おうそくとうかい) - transverse temporal gyri; ridges on the cerebral cortex; Heschl's gyri; Heschl's convolutions
横入り: (よこいり) - cutting in line; queue jumping
横兵庫: (よこひょうご) - extravagant female hairstyle worn by oiran courtesans
横切る: (よこぎる) - to cross (e.g. road); to traverse
